DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect QTc interval healthy male administer single dose NKTR-118 compare placebo moxifloxacin . ( QTc specific time interval measure heart beat take Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) )
DOC.brief_title: A Placebo-controlled Four Way Crossover Study Asses Effect Single Oral Dose NKTR-118 QTc Interval Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: A Single Center , Randomized , Double-blinded , Placebo-controlled , Open-label , Positive-controlled , Four-way Crossover Study Assess Effect Single Oral Dose NKTR-118 Administration QTc Interval Compared Placebo , Using AVELOX ( moxifloxacin ) Positive Control , Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male subject age 18 50 year ( inclusive ) suitable vein cannulation repeat venipuncture . Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 30 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) weight least 50 kg 100 kg . Clinically significant medical history include severe allergy history mental disorder cardiac history , history presence gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal disease . Abnormal heart rhythm include abnormal arrhythmia , mark sinus arrhythmia , junctional rhythm . Known suspected history drug abuse , current smoker smoke and/or use nicotine product within 3 month prior enrollment . Excessive intake caffeinecontaining product
